text: No kugira ngo Allah agaragaze indyarya, ubwo zabwirwaga ziti "Nimuze murwane mu nzira ya Allah, cyangwa (mudufashe) gukumira (umwanzi)". (Izo ndyarya) ziravuga ziti "Iyo tumenya ko hari urugamba, twari kubakurikira". Kuriuwo munsi, bo bari hafi cyane yâ€™ubuhakanyi kurusha ukwemera; bavugisha iminwa yabo ibitari mu mitima yabo. Kandi Allah azi bihebuje ibyo bahisha
